name: Cavelight (Sourdough Games)
description:
Full screen recommended.

You play as a ball of light collecting loops as currency while traveling through a cave and avoiding obstacles

Obstacles and loops are procedurally generated, and more obstacles and loops will be generated the more caves you finish.

This is my first ever gamejam game, and really my first game in general.

______________________________________________________________________________

Made on Unity thanks to these resources:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/mine-92461 - Models

https://pixabay.com/ - Sound

https://chat.openai.com/ - Coding assistant
